q: Simon Cowell would take lessons he's learned from other shows though- new judges David Hasselhoff and comedian David Hasselhoff MacIntyre were added to the panel on show Britain's Got Talent. Simon Cowell says: The most important thing I've learned with these shows is don't be predictable. We have to make sure all the shows are gon na be back bigger, better, stronger, different.

He said: They must now make a decision on our funding based on the real evidence about the difficulties our schools face. "We have said all along that we want to sit down and have an amicable discussion with the government about the difficulties our schools face.
